message:
This anime series was very worth to watch. I watched the episodes every night, the other episodes after every 3 days. I drank one shot of liquor before watching this. Maybe it's the alcohol's influence but I was clapping my hands like a kid and I was smiling all the time! I am so happy that I got to watch this very heartwarming show titled "Akebi's Sailor Uniform." This made me reminisce my high school times and I thought it is important to treasure memories such as Akebi's athletic festival.
Comment written on July 24th of the year 2022.
it's a work of art that felt short.
Fantastic show, I did get kind of bored during the middle, but this climax more than made up for it.
good anime to start my 2022

Man this was so cute, wholesome and relaxing.
The art and animation was incredibly good through the whole series, and i'm impressed at how they made me like an entire classroom of characters, it was a pretty fun ride.
I'd say it's like a 9/10 for me at the very least.
I feel bad at how Hebimori was like the only character that didn't won anything in the whole sports festival btw.

kinda random but i hope you guys appreciate the 3d/cgi work that is done. ik some scenes were noticable to me but still was no where near jarring that it took me out of the experience. crazy how cloverworks is making phenomenal anime while also pushing the industry forward by testing new techniques and integrating cgi where possible and retaining a good amount of quality with it.

Kizaki will easily be one of the most talented females to graduate from their class lol. she just bodied a piano solo then swapped midway to violin like damn bro ðŸ˜‚. I genuinely wonder if this manga/source material is purely meant to be slice of life or what tho. bc akebi has so many talented friends around her i wouldnt be suprised if they spun it into an idol show eventually. either way they clearly know wtf they are doing and i will just enjoy this series from now on.
we'll wait for season 2 ðŸ’–

Why do I get the feeling they won't be making this a s2 :(

as much as id want it like everyone else clearly the amount of ppl watching this show pales in comparison to alot of other shows made by cloverworks this year and ofc this season (dress up darling). an easy way to guage its popularity is literally just look at the comment section lol. a total of 243 comments for this godteir finale ep vs dress up darling and so many other shows this season easily breaking 2k every ep in comparison. sadly dont think it will be financially smart in the eyes of cloverworks atleast to do a season 2 based off viewership atleast. only hope we have for a s2 is if blu-ray sales, merch etc. for this show somehow is really good bc those are usually the direct money makers for them. so if the audience is small but is very dedicated to supporting the series there is a small hope! ik i will definitely be supporting by buying the mangas and blu rays when possible because id hate to see this show not get the animation it deserves from a company like clover works that cares.
I wouldn't be so sure, shows like this tend to do way better in japan
